title: *Sun-Lit 3-Bedroom Apartment in Prime Greenpoint* 45 5B
posting_body: ["*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building And ALL of Rentopia's Properties* We have a great relationship with this landlord and we are the best point of contact for this building", '*Sun-Lit 3-Bedroom Apartment in Prime Greenpoint*', 'The pictures are showing the actual available unit - I took them myself!', "Broker fee of 1 month's rent is due at the lease signing", '*The Apartment Features:*', '3 Queen-Size Bedrooms / Floor-to-Ceiling Windows / Great Natural Light All Throughout the Apartment / Bathroom with a Deep Soaking Tub / Spacious Living Space that Can Accommodate a Full Set of Entertainment Furniture & a Dining Table / AC Unit in Each Room / Open Concept Kitchen Stainless Steel Appliances including a Dishwasher & Vent / Rustic Interiors / High Ceilings / Hardwood Floors / Video Intercom /', '*The Building Features:*', '2 Roofdecks / Lounge / Laundry Room / Elevator /', 'A Step Away from the G Train at Nassau Ave Station /', '*Good credit history 700+ and a combined annual income of $177,000+ (=40x times the monthly rent) are required / Personal guarantors are welcome! /', '"Insuret" is accepted on a case by case basis*']
